query: 如图,在▱ABCD中,EF过对角线的交点O,AB=4,AD=5,OF=2,则四边形BAEF的周长为()选项：['22', '18', '13', '11']
answer: 解:在▱ABCD中,AD∥BC,OB=OD,∴∠EDO=∠FBO,在△BOF和△DOE中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠EDO=∠FBO\\OB=OD\\∠EOD=∠FOB(对顶角相等)\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△BOF≌△DOE(ASA),∴OE=OF,BF=DE,四边形BAEF的周长=AB+BF+EF+AE=AB+DE+2OF+AE=AB+AD+2OF,∵AB=4,AD=5,OF=2,∴四边形BAEF的周长=4+5+2×2=13．故选:C．
